EmailTemplate.name: Email 3a: Pre-Travel test Results Verified (ACCEPTED)
EmailTemplate.subject: Your COVID-19 pre-travel test result has been verified for Salesforce at Davos
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
-Please do not forward- Hi {!Contact.Name},
To ensure the health and safety of our in-person attendees, and the community at Davos, we have protocols in place before and during the event.
Great news — your pre-travel test result has been verified. Every step you take in our safety protocol goes a long way in keeping everyone safe — thank you!
Next Steps: * When you arrive at Davos, present the QR Code above at the Salesforce Welcome Center to check in (You will need to check in before accessing any Salesforce spaces).
* Welcome Center is located at: 81 Promenade, Davos Platz Monday - Tuesday from 6:30 a.m. - 8:30 p.m. CET Wednesday from 6:30 a.m. - 11:59 p.m. CET
Questions? Please reach out to davos@salesforce.com.
We look forward to welcoming you safely at Davos!
Thanks, Salesforce Davos Team
Please note that any handling of your personal data will be done in accordance with the Salesforce Privacy Statement.
